channel.title: Omfg i need help please
channel.description: Starting pimpscape Server on 0.0.0.0:5555 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "2 " at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException. java:48) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:456) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:497) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:117) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:30) at server.main(server.java:29)

item.title: Omfg i need help please
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

oh, i cant be bothered to help you on your error but… go into your server.java in source… and search for

public static int serverlistenerPortit will look something like :

	public static int serverlistenerPort = 5555; //5555

if you want your port to be default (43594)
replace it all with

	public static int serverlistenerPort = 43594; //43594=default

Read full topic
